employment.title: Software Developer
employment.description: Providing data management support and assisting the end-user community with the development of databases, web-based applications for data entry purposes and prepare reports for end users.

employment.title: Technical Services Advisor
employment.description: Be the in-store example of the Microsoft vision of the customer relationship.

employment.title: Data Analyst
employment.description: Provide patients and their caregivers with the knowledge, skills and resources to transition smoothly through the continuum of healthcare from hospitalization to a return to the community.

employment.title: Programmer
employment.description: Worked on side projects and real-world agency-based applications in a wide array of languages and tools.

employment.title: Computer Sales Consultant
employment.description: Communicated with customer clients in-house over top-notch selling brands.

employment.title: Webmaster Intern
employment.description: Created brand-new website from scratch with front-end capabilities.

employment.title: IT Intern
employment.description: Assisted in repairing software and hardware at several workstations.

employment.title: Technology Assistant
employment.description: Assisted in the Career Services department on campus, creating Powerpoint presentations and an Access career database.
